story:
Overview

When Harvey, a geek lab technician rattles the words… "Evildoers better flee, here comes…Mercury!" Harvey magically transforms into the superhero powerhouse, Mercury Mouse, to fight crime in action-packed Mousetropolis.

Hi, my name is Larry Rains. I’m the creator of Mercury Mouse. I’m a full-time cartoonist in Panama City Beach, Florida. I’ve created cartoon art, storyboards, and animation for TV, Movies, and Comics for over 25 years.

Mercury Mouse is an ongoing, all-age, webcomic I've been working on for over a year now. With a growing base of fans and now over 100 pages of story, it’s time to make the leap from the web into your hands as a comic book.

I’m excited to announce that I’m launching this Indiegogo campaign to help fund the printing of the first 3 issues of Mercury Mouse. All 3 comic books are ready to be printed and shipped to you, I just need your support to get the ball rolling.

 

Book Summaries

• Book 1 - This comic book is a 36 page full color comic that introduces Harvey, Professor Wackadoo, Stella, and our hero Mercury Mouse! In this action packed first issue Mercury Mouse takes on the Carp King.

• Book 2 - 'The Wrath of Killian' is a 44 page full color comic in which Astro Labs battles against an old rival who is set on revenge.

• Book 3 - In this 40 page full color comic, a vanishing villain known as 'The Rubberband Chameleon' springs up in Mousetropolis who can slip past anyone's radar... including Mercury Mouse. This issue features a never before seen BONUS story titled 'Rocky Road.'

 

As a Thank You for your Pledge

All backers who support this campaign will have their name printed on the 'Thanks for your Support' page in the first issue.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not able to make a pledge at this time but would like to help support the campaign, please let others know about Mercury Mouse by sharing this page!

 

Stretch Goals

Stretch Goals will be announced once we are funded.

 

Book Covers

Interior Page Samples

story:
Short Summary

I was born and raised in the small town of Kazan, Russia. I did not have many opportunities to travel while growing up, but that never stopped me from admiring the globetrotting lifestyle. I wanted to travel to different countries, meet new people, and understand diverse cultures and ways of life.

My desire to see the world prompted me to accept a position with MARS, Inc. in which international travel was actually part of the job description! I’ve explored nearly half of the world since then, but I can never get enough of one place in particular – Thailand!

Having an apartment in Thailand will allow me to enjoy the most beautiful sunsets on Earth, hear and feel the ocean, taste exotic fruits, and be as close to nature as possible!

I know I’m not alone in my love of Thailand, and that’s why I want to share it with you.

I’ve selected a beautiful, brand new, and fully furnished apartment in Pattaya, Thailand within easy walking distance to the beach. But before I move in, YOU can enjoy a stay in the apartment. For just $50 a day, you’ll enjoy the comforts of home and also fund the apartment’s purchase.

This is the perfect opportunity to make sure your Thailand vacation is not only affordable, but also luxurious. Why stay at an overpriced hotel when you can relax in a private apartment? This is a limited time offer, as the apartment will only be available to contributors and stays can only be booked for the first three years after the apartment’s purchase .

What We Need & What You Get

$54,000 is needed ($51K property +$3K legal and light refurbishment) to buy this apartment: 

http://www.rightmove.co.uk/overseas-property/property-34514191.html

Perks are unique and unbeatable: 

I won’t be living in the apartment for the first 3 years, so until then it is completely yours to enjoy. You are welcome to make yourself at home in this beautiful apartment for the number of days proportional to your contribution value! (See perks section for details.)

$54,000 (total apartment cost) / 360 (rounded number of days in a year) / 3 (number of years) = $50 cost per day, which is way cheaper than a hotel. 

An online booking tool will show the availability of the apartment and the days already booked by other contributors. Access to the booking tool will be based on the order of contribution.

You can choose any day(s) within the 3 years following my purchase of the apartment, or you can exchange days with other contributors. During these first 3 years, the apartment will remain available only to contributors and will not be otherwise rented. If campaign brings more, then 3 years will be extended to allow all contributors visit & enjoy.

By donating just $100, you’ll get to enjoy 2 days in the apartment you’ve helped me buy!


    The Impact

    I’m confident this project will be a success based on my recent experience purchasing an apartment in Moscow for my family, managing its refurbishment, and moving in within 2 months!

    Moreover, given my work as a professional project manager, I believe this can be done quite easily if given sufficient funding.

    By providing affordable yet comfortable lodging, it’s my hope that more people can experience the beauty of the country I’ve come to love so much. 

    Risks & Challenges

    There is always the possibility that not enough funds will be raised in order to purchase the apartment. The backup plan for this scenario is as follows:

    ·  Insufficient funding will enable me to look for another “value for money” apartment, and the conditions for living in it will remain the same.

    ·  If little funding is received and I am not able to buy anything, you’ll get your money back still getting personal “Thank you” from myself :)


      Other Ways You Can Help

      Any and all help is highly appreciated and I am always grateful for it:

      • Reposts
      • Likes
      • Links sent out
      • Recommendations
      • Articles, etc.
      • Contribution
      • Advice on purchasing real estate in Thailand
      • Anything else you may think of :)

story:
Together with my artist Baleandor we've begun making a comic that both of us believe in. A story about regular people that have been put into an irregular situation. Something with good characters, humor, love, betrayal, and action to blend it all together. My name is James Morris the writer of Awakening and I'd like to be the first one to say thank you for visiting this page and thank you even more if you choose to pick up our book.

 

The money you donate will go towards the printing costs for Awakening and funding to begin making a part 2. It will also go towards making Awakening a better book by increasing the physical quality of our product. Our delivery date is going to be June 2019, if this changes I will notify all backers of any delays and the reasons for them. The reason for the release being so far down the road is the need for fine tuning and making sure the quality of our book is up to what consumers demand. This is also our first crowd funding campaign and we intend to take our time and make sure things are done right. We don't want to give a date that we don't think we can meet.

 

Lastly I'd like to say thank you for everyone who donates to this Indiegogo and we are both dedicated to bringing you the best possible book we can. I will be making regular updates not only here, but on our twitter page at https://twitter.com/JamesMo24702205 please follow us for updates on the book.

story:
This campaign will decide the future of my weekly editorial cartoon, “Code Green.” I’m considering ending it, but if readers would like it to continue, I’ll keep drawing it for at least one more year (after that, we'll see). It’s up to you.

(For the record, I'll keep my daily comic strip, "Minimum Security," still going either way for now).

“Code Green” is, as far as I know, the only regular editorial cartoon in the U.S. devoted exclusively to the environmental crisis. You can see examples in the video above. During the three years I’ve been drawing it, I’ve covered topics like deforestation, heavy metal pollution, the Keystone XL tarsands oil pipeline, species extinction, the BP oil spill, and (of course) global warming.

The cartoons have been reprinted all over the world, from Bangladesh to Saudi Arabia, Canada to Australia. Protesters at demonstrations have printed them on signs. Organizers put them on leaflets and in their newsletters. Readers share them on blogs. They’ve run in my local daily paper, and even better, in several papers put out by Occupy movement groups. Last year, I won first prize in the category of editorial cartooning from the Society of Professional Journalists, and this year I won the RFK Journalism Award for editorial cartoons that contribute to human rights and social justice.

There’s a problem though. We all know print media has crashed. Editorial cartooning, as a profession, has crashed along with it. Three and a half years ago I was laid off from the paper where I worked (it later folded). So I went freelance. But print media no longer pays very much for content. Websites often refuse to pay anything at all. Consequently, it turns out I’m unable to make a living this way (defined as: very basic food, shelter, health care, and transportation). This is not unusual for cartoonists these days. Many excellent cartoonists have had to quit and find other kinds of work. I may be next.

So I’m turning to my readers to see if they want to support “Code Green.” I know many of you are also struggling in this crap economy, so I almost don’t even want to ask. But lately, when I’ve told people that I’m thinking of no longer drawing it, some have responded with dismay. Each day, people write to me about how much they like my cartoons (which I very much appreciate). I don’t think it’s simply politeness – I believe that these cartoons do connect with a section of people who are deeply concerned with the fate of our planet. The cartoons make them feel less alone, cheer them on, encourage them to fight back against the ecocidal system. This, precisely, is what I draw them for. I hate that I have to make money with them too, but this is the unfortunate reality of living under capitalism (which I’m also trying to do something about, but that’s another topic).

So it comes down to this: If readers want “Code Green” to keep coming, I’m willing to do it. But if these cartoons don’t contribute more to my livelihood, I can’t spend the time required to create them – which is considerable (punch lines don’t come easy for me, and there’s a lot of research involved). For $9000, I’ll keep them coming for another year. After campaign fees, taxes and postage, plus payment for Root Robin (who generously offered the use of the delightful song in the video for free if I don't reach my goal -- this is an all-or-nothing deal; if the total goal isn't reached, your pledge is refunded), this comes out to less than $100 per weekly cartoon. That's a very modest amount, especially compared to what editorial cartoonists used to make. I’m not looking to get rich – simply to get by doing work that I believe has some social value.

I’ll post and share this in a few places, but I hate asking for money. So there will be no email campaigns, no spamming, no begging. I won't send more than one email to people about this (except updates for those who contribute). If you like "Code Green" and want to support it and spread the word to others, you will. If not, that’s okay too. I’m fine with ending “Code Green” – but first I want to let you have a say in the matter.

Thank you.
Stephanie McMillan

story:
What happens when the sins you struggle with most...Can face you, hunt you, feed on you and eventually destroy you themselves? 


Welcome to the Astria Galaxy!

...A world filled with myths, legends and creatures of all different backgrounds and species. High above them, between the galaxy and the heavens, lies Astria; the world of living breathing color. Angels to some, protectors to others, the Astrians live as one with the universe, becoming anything it needs. Created by the Exalted One, they are the only protection between the galaxy and Sin. Some will overcome, while some give in. Their choices effect the overall UNITY; a delicate creature whose influence could destroy the galaxy. It is then that the biggest lessons are learned...

You can read the comic so far by clicking here!


About This Project

The first novel in the Dawn of Unity series: Genesis has already been published and over 100 copies have been sold. Now I want to take it and transform it into a series of Comic Books. I have already split the novel up into Arcs, as milestones for myself to get parts complete. This Campaign is only for the First Arc.

The comic will serve to give the reader a different perspective from what is written in the novel. In other words, the comic will NOT be told exactly like the novel. Though the main events will be the same, I strive to give you a new way of looking at the story itself.

As said above, you can read what has been done so far on the website for free. But think of that version as the rough draft. The version that will be printed will have touched up pages, and in some cases, completely redone pages. There will also be extra artwork included that you will not find online. PLUS all the pages in the comic books will be printed in FULL color.


REWARDS

We all like to know what we are getting! For this campaign there are TWO main special rewards that I am offering:

The first is a special Limited Edition version of Issue 1 that has a SKETCH COVER! This means that you get an original one of a kind piece of artwork on the cover! You can choose ANY Astria Legends character that you want. That character will even leave their own signature on the picture! Now how many of you can say you got your favorite character's autograph?

The second is the BIG EXCLUSIVE REWARD. In the First Arc, there is an item that is introduced that is very important to one of the characters. In this reward, YOU will receive a genuine replica of that item! The item will be signed and numbered. You will also receive exclusive art and information on the item's use as well as the character it belongs to!

Also, if we EXCEED our goal and break $1000, I am going to add a 11x17 mini poster print of brand new, never before seen art to ALL backers who pledged $20 and up! To backers below $20, they will get a desktop wallpaper of the same artwork!

Goals and Dreams

I have been working on the Christian Fantasy world of Astria Legends for over ten years. I desire to empower people with the knowledge that they can make a difference both in their own lives and in the lives of others. I want to teach them that every decision that they make has the power to affect those they will never come in contact with and can last lifetimes. The Dawn of Unity Series is a fantasy, something that young adults as well as adults can get into, but it is also a tool. A tool that shows that no matter how old you are, what you have done, what you have been through, your background, race, how you were brought up or what others have said about you, that it is never too late to make a change.

I hope that by the pictures you see that I am putting out my very best artwork into this comic to make it a beautiful and quality product.

Should this campaign be a success I want to continue until the entire novel is transformed into comic form. Then I want to continue the entire Dawn of Unity series in comic books until the saga is complete!


Risks and Challenges

The Risks and challenges of this project is having the time to finish it according to the deadline. I feel that I have given myself ample time to complete the arc including buffer just encase "life" happens.

Also there is the time it will take for the books to be printed. Depending on how long the lead time is, books may not be sent out on time. This is outside of my control but I will keep all backers updated on this situation should it come up.


Dream and Believe

Over ten years in the making, such a long time spent on a dream. It has been a journey, both for me as well as all those who dwell in Astria Galaxy... and the journey has only just begun!

Help me make it possible! If you can't contribute, that's perfectly ok, I only ask that you pray and spread the word to whomever you can. Every little bit counts.
story_txt:
What happens when the sins you struggle with most...Can face you, hunt you, feed on you and eventually destroy you themselves? 



Welcome to the Astria Galaxy!...A world filled with myths, legends and 
creatures of all different backgrounds and species. High above them, 
between the galaxy and the heavens, lies Astria; the world of living 
breathing color. Angels to some, protectors to others, the Astrians live
 as one with the universe, becoming anything it needs. Created by the 
Exalted One, they are the only protection between the galaxy and Sin. 
Some will overcome, while some give in. Their choices effect the overall
 UNITY; a delicate creature whose influence could destroy the galaxy. It
 is then that the biggest lessons are learned...


You can read the comic so far by clicking here!

story:
I've been working as a freelance illustrator and making playing cards, drawing figures for game developers. I also have self-published books, mostly black and white comics. I have been working to BigFoot Games  as an illustrator, in project PAZIC. I'm also coloring comic books: I worked together with Calvin Nye (Joe Hero comic). I also have been working with Alex Johnson (GN - Lab of the dead) 

My publications:
  • World of Frames comic book anthology (2008-2013)
  • The Light of the Land comic book (2013)
 My work was published in:

  •  Necromancia artbook (2013)
  • Epicline magazine (2015)

By supporting this type of project, you give a chance to me to keep my story on, and be able to publish my first colored comic book in printed version worldwide. This is a Fixed Funding, so it means the english version will be printed only when I reach the goal before the deadline. If this campaign doesn't reach the goal, you will get a refund, and the book will be printed only in my country with limited edition. I wish a successful result, hahaha! So if you like my style, D&D and elves, I'm sure you will enjoy this graphic novel.

If we exceed the 600 usd, I will add surprises, extras to you. ;)

Milestone goals are below


What is Esras?

Esras is a fantasy world created by me and my friend, Caspar. There are four kingdoms: Kingdom Mist, Gaia, Kingdom Frost and Skuld. The main character of the comic is Azzedar. A grumpy veteran half-elf who specialized for murder.

He hates drow, because they ruined his life, but he uses all those bad experiences to survive. He has no luck in love, his first lover betrayed him and their children had died. His stubbornness, perseverance and his martial experience helps him to live day by day, but his soul is broken.
Azz met a girl, Ookamiza, who became his supporter and they traveled together for some years. She is cheerful, always giving strength to him and the one who has balls. Her ingenuity was useful many times when danger came.

He wandered for years before entering the Esras kingdom's military. Azzedar helped a little group of soldiers and civilians in a battle reach the safe zone. The captain found him useful so he asked him to join the army. So Azz stayed and got twenty men to lead in a local conflict. Azz found new friends in the realm. One of them is Arlen, the colonel of Frost Realm. As time passed, Azzedar also became a colonel in the army of Gaia.



If you are interested in his past, in comic named The Light of the Land you can get to know about his young ages. However it's an older publication and there are only 20 pieces. Do not miss the chance ^__~


Synopsis

The long columns slowly marched toward the field of battle. This would be the first real fight for some, anyone watching could easily tell the veterans from the rookies. The greenhorns marched with trembling feet. They rubbernecked and gawked like a startled turtle, many try to draw themselves in their armor, alongside them, the veterans as if they were on a routine patrol. Only minor tells; a small stumble, hand gestures, an eye twitching, betrayed their own fears, they were in their own way just as scared as the greeners.
One man alone shows no emotion, leading the army with a calmness of one who already knows how the battle will turn out. He isn't afraid, not of fighting or death, no, his enemy is something else....something completely different.


Summary of the project:

  • 45-50 colored comic pages
  • A5 size
  • English version
  • Genre: fantasy, adventure, action
Already done on this project :
  •  Cover sketch, design
  •   Script completed
  •  34 inked pages completed
  • 10 colored pages completed

Previews:

Previews:

story:
Roma Invicta è la nuova etichetta indipendente che si prefigge lo scopo di recuperare, riproporre e valorizzare la produzione letteraria edita e inedita di Mario Farneti, uno dei grandi maestri italiani della fantascienza e del romanzo storico.

Iniziamo con la raccolta in un prestigioso volume unico dei fumetti tratti dal ciclo dei romanzi di Occidente (Occidente, Attacco all’Occidente, Nuovo Impero di Occidente), il ciclo più famoso e innovativo di Mario Farneti.

Cosa troverete in questo volume?

Le cinque storie contenute nel volume, uscite singolarmente in albi tra il 2006 e il 2010, hanno trasformato in personaggi dei fumetti tutti i protagonisti di Occidente e non solo sono adattamenti di episodi contenuti nei romanzi, ma aggiungono anche degli elementi inediti alla lunghissima saga ucronica e fantascientifica di Mario Farneti.

Un piccolo assaggio della trama che troverete nelle storie a fumetti:

Giugno 1940: Mussolini sceglie la neutralità e non entra in guerra a fianco di Hitler. Nove mesi dopo la caduta del nazismo, scoppia un nuovo conflitto. L'Armata Rossa sconfina oltre il fiume Oder, ma grazie all'intervento delle truppe italiane, viene fermata e respinta. E' la Terza Guerra Mondiale. Gli eserciti dei paesi occidentali dilagano attraverso le steppe russe.

Aprile 1948:Alle porte di Mosca un manipolo di eroi dovrà affrontare un nemico segreto e invincibile. Le più temibili armi segrete dell'Armata Rossa e delle Camice Nere si affronteranno nella battaglia decisiva per le sorti del futuro di Occidente.

Marzo 1948: in un villaggio sperduto vicino il lago Sevan si svolge uno degli episodi chiave della Terza Guerra Mondiale. Stalin, fuggiasco in Armenia dopo l’armistizio, sta per riparare in Cina ma incontra  i valorosi del 42° Battaglione da sbarco Camice Nere “M” che scriveranno una della più eroiche pagine della storia italiana (che non fu) di tutti i tempi.

1962, una minacciosa svastica di luce illumina l'ultima notte di Romano Tebaldi e Giulia Flaviani Morosini alla Scuola Superiore di Telecomunicazioni di Fiume. I progetti dell'arma segreta MK66, lì custoditi, sono in pericolo. Sotto lo sguardo severo della Dea Roma, presto le strade dei due giovani si divideranno, ma non prima che abbiano affrontato insieme le forze occulte sorte dalle ceneri della Seconda Guerra Mondiale. E' giunto il momento che a Romano Tebaldi venga affidata la sua prima missione che lo porterà in Libia, "hic sunt leones".

E questo è solo un assaggio, perché nel volume proposto succedono tante altre cose imperdibili sia per chi già conosce e ama il ciclo di Occidente sia per chi lo scopre solo adesso. In ogni caso è un volume che non potete assolutamente perdervi.

I fumetti sono realizzati da Piero Viola e Claudio Franchino (sceneggiature), Claudio Valenti e Bruno Farinelli (disegni) su soggetto e supervisione di Mario Farneti

Aderendo a questa campagna potrete avere un volume pregiato e prestigioso contenente i fumetti tratti da Occidente di Mario Farneti.

Il volume avrà le seguenti caratteristiche:

  • Formato 17 cm x 24 cm;
  • Copertina a colori su cartoncino 300 gr. Plastificata opaca;
  • Interni: 172 pagine in bianco e nero stampate su carta 120 gr.;
  • Il volume conterrà anche alcuni contenuti speciali inediti.

Per realizzare questo volume ci siamo prefissati di raccogliere 2500 Euro così divisi:

  • 1000 euro per allestimento, impaginazione e stampa dei volumi;
  • 1000 euro per i diritti di pubblicazione;
  • 500 euro di tasse, oneri legali e spedizioni.

Per realizzare il nostro obiettivo, come perk, mettiamo in prevendita:

  • la possibilità di avere autografato il volume da Mario Farneti;
  • la possibilità di avere insieme al volume un disegno originale e inedito realizzato dal fumettista Claudio Valenti, creatore grafico della serie a fumetti.

Perché porre fiducia in Roma Invicta?

Perché da qui parte l’importante operazione editoriale di riproporre e valorizzare ancora una volta tutto il corpus letterario di un autore importante come Mario Farneti, che ha in preparazione nuovi capitoli di Occidente e di Imperium Solis, già bestseller dell'Editrice Nord e dell'Editrice TEA acclamati dalla stampa italiana e internazionale.

Vi va di darci una mano ulteriore?

Spargete la voce su questa campagna, ditelo a più gente possibile. Spammate e diffondete, al massimo qualche amico che è più interessato a Masterchef che a Occidente e ai Fumetti vi manderà al diavolo, ma quello che è soltanto un click per voi, è vitale per noi diffondere un’opera ucronica di grande spessore e originalità! Non esitate quindi a utilizzare gli strumenti di condivisione di Indiegogo e di tutti i social network che frequentate per diffondere questa campagna!

About Godheads...

GODHEADS follows the story of Eximius, son of an alien who artificially impregnated a human woman ahead of an imminent invasion, Eximius has super-strength and the ability to fly. He has being instructed by his biological father to form a team of the planet’s most powerful warriors to defeat the astronauts and free his people.

The rest of the team consists of:

FORTIS. Leader of the White Mountain people. He is a savage werewolf like creature and the team’s muscle.

NUNET. The Golden goddess. The queen of a woman ruling society, she has the power to create mini-black holes that swallow her enemies. 

GŌSUTO. The mysterious ghost of an ancient samurai army. He is quiet and honorable, he carries with himself two samurai swords.

LORD VISHNU. King of the clouds. This three-armed blue skin god’s weapons of choice are a bow and arrow (which he uses with his left hands) and a trident. He is able to see all levels of reality at the same time.

VIRACOCHA. The Incan warrior. Chosen to represent his people, he carries a piece of meteorite that gives him the power to project an orange aura of several deadly animals.

We really love this project and we think you will too, Ariel's art is amazing on it. But don't just take our word of it. You can read the first 10 pages of the comic HERE.

Who are we?

Ariel Medel - Artist

This artist extraordinaire started working in the US comics industry in 2013 for Zenescope Entetainment, doing such titles as Quest, Wonderland, Masumi and Grimm Fairy Tales. 
On 2015, he went on to do an 8 issue run on John Carter: Warlord of Mars for Dynamite Entertainment, written by Ron Marz and Ian Edginton.
Ariel currently draws the new Xena: Warrior Princess series from Dynamite, written by acclaimed author and Catwoman writer: Genevieve Valentine.

Gerardo Preciado - Writer

Gerardo's stories exploded on the scene in 2013 with the fan made viral webcomic 'Batman: The Deal' and 'God's End' from his previous blog Moonhead Press, which featured on numerous prestigious sites such as Wired, io9, Bleeding Cool and many others. In 2015 he debuted in print with Zenescope's Grimm Tales of Terror # 9, a love letter to 80's slasher films. In late 2015 he started a new webcomics blog with artist and friend David Marquez called Old Skull Comics where he could let his imagination run free, the blog already features several stories including Master of the Lords, an ode to 80's cartoons.


Paco Medina - Cover Artist

Paco Medina, a Marvel Comics veteran, started his career drawing Superman for DC Comics. Later on, he moved to Marvel to illustrate titles like X-Men, New X-Men, Spectacular Spider-Man, Nova, Legendary Star-Lord, Contest of Champions and more recently New Avengers.




GODHEADS Digital Version Cover by Marvel artist Paco Medina.

The book will also be inked by Victor Nava and colored by Zenescope Entertainment colorist Hedwin Zaldivar.

Why we need you.

We want to produce the highest quality product we can, with top notch inking, coloring and lettering. The money raised thru this campaign will be used to pay the rest o the art team, as well as the actual shipping of the book.

What you get.

You can get the GODHEADS comic in both printed and digital editions, sketches and even original pages from the book. And of course your name printed on a special 'Thank You' section of the book.

Original pencil pages from Ariel Medel.

Finally.

Thank you so much for taking a look at our campaign, we hope you'll be able to support us, if you can't donate at this time, please help us spread the word about it on social media.
Again, thank you!

story:
Short Summary

HEAVEN: Where you can live on after you die, for a price. A graphic novel set in two worlds; a man-made Heaven and Earth in the not too distant future, HEAVEN is the story of the last great creation by mankind; one that some from the religious right are seeking to destroy.

Heaven is an upcoming new 64 page graphic novel created and written by Anthony and Darko Kotorac and illustrated by fan favourite Norm Breyfogle. 

What We Need & What You Get

PENCILS TAKE is the crowdfunding redone from http://igg.me/p/466379/x/3952623 based on feedback given to us. Unlike the last campaign this campaign is fixed funding so it's ALL or NOTHING. 

GOAL 1 - Norm Breyfogle pencilling all 64 pages along with funds for the rewards and Indiegogo's fee. ($19,000 of which $13760 is for the pencils themselves)

STRETCH GOAL 1 - Funds for Norm Breyfogle to ink all 64 pages (Additional $8960)

STRETCH GOAL 2 - Funds for Norm Breyfogle to do a painted cover ($2000)

Our aim is to have all 64 pages pencilled and inked by Norm Breyfogle and to have a painted cover by Norm as well! It is anticipated that the graphic novel will be started in October 2013. 

The book will be available in a limited 750 print run that will ONLY be availble here on Indiegogo. Here's your chance to own an extremely limited edition just by showing your support! 

The amount of pages that need to be done is the equivelant of three monthly books which is what the majority of the costs are going to. 

The rewards are straightforward: We have digital and print copies, signed copies, head sketches and some full figure commissions! Norm has not been able to take on commissions for a few years now so here's your chance to score one!

Here is a chance to see some more awesome artwork from one of the best artists in the business showcasing an awesome story!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate share this around! Spread the word!

Our aim is to have all 64 pages pencilled and inked by Norm Breyfogle and to have a painted cover by Norm as well! It is anticipated that the graphic novel will be started in October 2013. 
The book will be available in a limited 750 print run that will ONLY be availble here on Indiegogo. Here's your chance to own an extremely limited edition just by showing your support! 
The amount of pages that need to be done is the equivelant of three monthly books which is what the majority of the costs are going to. 
The rewards are straightforward: We have digital and print copies, signed copies, head sketches and some full figure commissions! Norm has not been able to take on commissions for a few years now so here's your chance to score one!


Here is a chance to see some more awesome artwork from one of the best artists in the business showcasing an awesome story!


Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't donate share this around! Spread the word!

story:
Share and win !!! If the amount of people´s contributions from your sharings are bigger than $300 you´ll win a printed copy of this book plus a t-shirt with a draw of your choice! You only need to share this campaign in this page and be logged in the indiegogo site !

 * this is only valid if the campaign became funded.



   Aid your draws with this amazing character poses reference guide, the HQ Poses Book! With the help of this book you can be able to draw characters for comics, cards, rpg and much more!

   In this book you´ll see a diversified range of character poses, ranked in pose chapters for an easy and fast access. You´ll see draws like melee weapon, close combat, suffering pain, intimidation, using firearms, looking and lifting weights. Achieving the stretch goals the book will grow and new chapters can be included, like unconscious, acrobatics, sadness, talking, running, afraid and so on.

   Share this idea to see it grow strong! Bigger the amount of money collected, bigger the content! If you can´t contribute with money, share in Tweeter and Facebook! The Share Goals section will show you that we reward with new poses and products each share goal achieved!

   The first funding goal of 1,8 thousand will guarantee the existence of the book! The consecutives goals will increase the number of draws and types of categories. With 7,4 thousand collected, a making of video of the book will be created and all backers will own it! With 15,5 thousand collected a software version of this book will be created! Go to the Upgrades section to see the benefits achieved with the stretch and share goals.

   This campaign is fixed funding, if the amount of 1,8 thousand is not collected your money will be refunded and the project won´t exist.

   You are the agent of the success and patron of this dream. Please help this initiative and be a co-patron of this innovative project! Andre Modesto, the project´s creator, is a designer and 3d artist that have being working for the TV industry in the last 5 years, creating animations and visual effects for millions of TV viewers (see the Meet the Creator section in the end of the project).

   You will get incredible perks of this project if you contribute! Go to the Perk section to see what you get!!!


   The funds raised in this campaign will help finish the book content, the print and the shipping. The value of 1,8k is the minimum needed to do so. The extra money raised will stretch our goals bringing new pages to the book, the opportunity to better the quality of the print and to create extra products to the backers, like the making of video and the software version of the book.

   The money contribution is important, but share the project is also important to us! Visibility is a main question in a well succeeded project, and our sharing goals will bring to you extra HQ Pose Book pages and new products, like the HQ Sexy Poses and HQ Heroes Sketches book!

   Let´s create the success of this project, share this idea and contribute!


   In the day of your contribution you´ll get a pdf demo version of the book with 10 poses! Even if the project wouldn´t get the minimum funding goal, we show our gratitude with our contributors giving this short demo!

   In the project´s funding day, even if the campaign still not ended, you´ll get a pdf demo version of the book with 25 poses!

   After the end of the campaign, we need one to two months to finish the book content (depending on the final number of pages). After that, two weeks for print the books plus the shipping time (this shipping time depends on the country send).


The amount of money raised in this campaign represents the quality and number of products available.  The initial goal will bring to us the existence of HQ Poses Book with 70 pose Pages! Our stretch goals will increase the number of pages, will upgrade the quality of the book, like be hardcover or have the Learning Chapters, and new elements like the making of video and a software version of the book! If we can´t raise the minimum of 1,8k the project won´t exist and you´ll receive your money back.


It´s crucial for us the project sharing because the success depends on how much people know it. The sharing goals stimulate the social network sharing giving upgrades to the HQ Poses Book and bring new products for the contributors! Wallpapers, HQ Sexy Poses Book and HQ Heroes Sketches Book are ready waiting your share!


   Sharing this project in the social networks or stretching our goals will increase the quality and types of perks availables for you! Help us to collect 1,8k to make real the HQ Poses Book!

   There are three ways to grow the page count of the HQ Poses Book, by the stretch goals, the sharing goals and by the perks Emperor and Divine! Colorful pages, big format book and hardcover are upgrades achieved by the stretching goals!

   1k sharing grants you 4 incredible wallpapers of the project! With 2,5k sharing you unlock the pdf copy of HQ Sexy Poses mini-book! 5k sharing grows 5 pages of this book. 7k sharing unlocks the HQ Heroes Sketches (this mini-book brings you draws of originals heroes and villains of HQ books)!

   Get an incredible making of video of this project if we achieve the 7,4k stretch goal, with 15,5k a software version of the HQ Poses Book for "Grand Patron" backers or up, with features like Quick Draw Search and Print Pose!



   Contribute with our project and get incredible perks. See below what you get!

All techniques and mechanisms required to complete the project are dominated, beginning with the already finished draws and the amount of 750 sketches able to be included in the book, just like the design and print processes. The unique challenging variable is the amount of pages that will be in the book, depending on the share and stretch goals, in a range between 70 to up 300 pages. The deadline of one month is perfect for it´s initial size, but if the book grows bigger more time can be necessary (maybe one month more for a 300 pages book). This is not a problem at all.


   The creator of the project, Andre Lima, 34 years, has being working for Globo TV, the largest commercial TV network in Latin American and the second-largest world-wide commercial TV network, in the last 5 years doing art, 3d, visual composition and draws for millions of TV viewers. He worked for entertainment and journalism. Since 2005, Andre works professionally with computer graphics and arts. Nowadays he wants to turn true your ideas, creating innovative projects for an imaginative community.

story:
The Sickest Love Story Ever Told

       Whorror Comix is giving the holiday of romance a sick spin like only they can. Welcum to Vagintine's Day, where cupid doesn't aim for the heart. No, his arrows go right up your...well let's just say you should read this tale with your legs crossed.

     We previously funded "Tales From The Whorehouse of Horror" Issue #1 this past summer. Following the success of that project, we're looking to give the world more of what they want - blood, violence, sex, perversion, and lots of laughs...and just in time for the holidays!

     With Vagintine's Day, we present one of our most fucked up comics yet. Co-starring horny cupids, a morphing love-monster, and Venus the goddess of love...with a very special guest appearance by infamous, real-life Ukrainian sex symbol and world's oldest working prostitute: Baba Alla (see her in action here)!

    With February 14th sneaking up on us faster than a Hollywood mogul with his fly down, you need to hurry and get the perfect gift for that special someone in your life. Flowers are for pussies and chocolate makes you fat - but comics say "I love you!" There's even a dedication page inside where you can write your and his/hers/its names!                                             

                                                     What do we need the money for?

Printing the comic! Everything is ready for the presses, except for YOU...are you ready? If you are, pre-order NOW!

story:
Abandon Your Wings is FREE to Read !

Chapter 1 (48 pages) + Chapter 2 (24 pages)

are available to read at

https://www.devoche.com/chapter-select

No login, no ads, no hassle! Read from Left to Right.

[Viewer Discretion Is Advised] 

 

The goal of this campaign is to help get this webcomic out of hiatus, by giving you and all the other fans, a physical copy of Chapter 1*. All future chapters of AYW will be free as well. Chapter 3 is ready to be made. With your help and support, Chapter 3 can come out in a couple of months instead of a couple of years.

Victoria, an unruly elf with a dark past, has a bounty placed on her head. In her desire for peace, she only finds struggle and must continually escape for a better life. When attempting to evade a group of hunters, she encounters and befriends a mysterious female lancer, Nephia. These two “heroines” must traverse through their strange world, while dealing with the mysteries and mayhem that seem drawn to them.

 

If you're a fan of Berserk, Goblin Slayer, or Re:Zero, then I guarantee you will enjoy the mayhem that will arise in this world. Don't let the cuteness fool you, things will get brutal.

Official (Cover A)

Ecchi Variant (Cover B)

[* The finalized art may differ slightly from the current version. Colors and character positions may change slightly before printing. But no drastic changes will be made.*]

 

 

Every single item in this campaign will be a limited edition item. Once the campaign ends, these items won't be available anymore. Chapter 1 may be reprinted in the future, but it will never have these two covers again. Hurry and secure these items before it's too late!

 

First 200 Backers will receive an art print for free.

[Size of the print isn't finalized yet, but I'll make it as big as I can.]

*[First Drafts, Character Design w/o Border, Final Drafts Will Look Different]*

I'm optimistic! Are You?!

$8,000 - Add New Art Print

  • Original Art (TBA)

$10,000 - Add Chapter 2 to the book.

  • Bring the total number of pages from (48+) to (72+)

$15,000 - Add an additional trading card to the set (Victoria) and new art print

  • Original Art (TBA)

$20,000- Add an additional trading card to the set (Nephia) and new art print

  • Original Art (TBA)

$40,000- Swimsuit and Lingerie Ashcan

  • Multiple Pages of our lovable characters in righteous attire.

 

 

My name is Novoa. I'm the creator of 'Abandon Your Wings'. AYW is my pride and joy, that I have worked on passionately by myself. It's been two years since I started this journey, and I don't want to give it up. It's been a year since I've released Chapter 1, and I'm eager to get started on Chapter 3. 

 

Realistically, nothing. Chapter 1 is complete. Chapter 2 is complete. In terms of the comic, all I need to do is fix up the files and send them to the printers. The trading cards won't take me very long to finish either.

If you're worried about fulfillment, don't worry. DEVOCHE is my company name. If I was to run off, which I won't, you can find me pretty quickly. 

If you're ever worried about something or want an update, please send me a message. I'll respond as soon as I can.

I set the estimated shipping to April, in the event, something drastic suddenly happens. If everything stays normal, then I'll get the ball rolling as soon as the campaign ends. I don't expect fulfillment to take very long at all. If something does happen, I will update everyone.

I'm located in the United States. [Domestic Shipping] is set to $10 and [International Shipping] is set to $20. There are also two perks that have free shipping worldwide. If the shipping price is a deal breaker for international buyers, please let me know. Send me a message and I may be able to help with a solution.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I completely understand that everyone can't help out monetarily. It's perfectly alright. 

If you believe in me, please help share this campaign or my website. Also please consider following me on other platforms.

 

[My apologies. Images are higher resolution and are less compressed on my site.]

story:
"C'era una volta, tanti tanti anni fa, un regno oscuro che popolava gli angoli bui di mezza Europa. Femmine diaboliche abitavano i pensieri proibiti degli uomini e delle donne più smaliziate e golose, i tetri anfratti delle case e i salotti dei barbieri. I loro nomi sono scolpiti sulle polverose lapidi della memoria: vampire senza vergogna, amanti morte, figlie del diavolo, streghe oscene e meretrici d'oltretomba stanno per risvegliarsi ed esaudire le vostre voglie più torbide e peccaminose. Solo la vostra insaziabile lussuria, il vostro perfetto feticismo potranno resuscitarle dall'oblio nel quale sono cadute, in un sonno profondo, avvolto dalle nebbie dell'abisso infernale. Quale incantesimo potrà risvegliarne le dolci, fredde membra? Quale desiderio occulto saprà riportarle in vita?".

 

ULULA BY EMANUELE TAGLIETTI

 

"Once upon a time, many many years ago, there was an obscure realm populating dark corners all over Europe. Diabolic female creature dwelled men's thoughts and savvy and greedy women's minds, wormed their way into the gloomy clefts of homes, living rooms and barbershops. Their names are carved on the dusty tombstones of memory: shameless vampires, dead lovers, devil's daughters, lewd witches and afterlife whores are about to reawaken to please your darkest and sinful cravings. Only your insatiable luxury, your perfect fetishism, will be able to revive them from the oblivion where they fell, in a deep sleep, shrouded in the fog of the infernal abyss. Which spell will reawaken their sweet cold limbs? Which occult desire could bring them back to life?".

"Il était une fois, il y'a bien des années, un univers sombre dont les créatures maudites habitaient les recoins obscurs d'Europe. Femelles diaboliques hantaient les rêveries languissantes d'hommes vicieux et de femmes gourmandes, ainsi que les recoins lugubres des celliers, caves et salons de coiffure. Leurs noms sont gravés dans les poussiéreux sépulcres de la mémoire: amantes défuntes, filles du diable, vampires sans vergogne, obscènes sorcières e méretrices d'outre-tombe n'attendent que vous pour se réveiller et assouvir vos envies pécheresses. Seule votre insatiable luxure et votre impeccable fétichisme pourraient les sortir de la torpeur dans laquelle elles sont tombées, recouvertes des brumes de l'infernal abîme de l'oubli. Quel sortilège pourra redonner vie à leurs corps doux et froids? Quel occulte désir saura les éveiller?".

 

 

Il progetto Vintagerotika - Evilsex di Annexia ripropone i generi e i personaggi più rappresentativi delle principali testate erotiche a fumetti dei pocket sexy vintage italiani, testate principalmente prodotte dagli editori Renzo Barbieri e Giorgio Cavedon dagli anni Sessanta in poi, ben radicate nella memoria collettiva italiana, con nuove brevi storie di famosi autori contemporanei. Un imperdibile appuntamento con il fumetto erotico d'autore per dare nuova vita e dignità a un genere considerato da sempre di serie B e snobbato dalla critica, ma pubblicato in tutta Europa per decenni. Ogni albo della rosa dei personaggi proposti conterrà anche un breve saggio critico e la cronologia della testata. 

I personaggi della prima fase del progetto, denominata EvilSex sono le antieroine dell’horror-sexy made in Italy: Zora la vampira, Sukia, Cimiteria, Ulula, Lucifera, Belzeba e Jacula.

 

Vintagerotika - Evilsex by Annexia calls out again the most representative genres and characters  of the main erotic comic books and Italian's sexy vintage pocket books. These were mainly produced by publishers Renzo Barbieri and Giorgio Cavedon as from the 70's onwards, deeply rooted in the Italian collective memory, including with new short stories by famous contemporary authors. An unmissable rendezvous with auter erotic comics to give new life and dignity to a genre that always rated a B serie genre  and snubbed by the critics, though published all over Europe for decades. Every book of the chosen characters shortlist will also feature a brief critical essay and the chronology of the sheet. 

The early phase characters, called Evilsex, are the anti-heroines of the horror-sexy genre made in italy: Zora la vampira (the she-vampire), Sukia, Cimiteria, Ulula, Lucifera, Belzeba and Jacula.

 

Le projet Vintagerotika - Evilsex de Annexia vous propose de faire revivre les genres et les personnages plus significatifs des principales Bandes-Dessinées érotiques des éditions pocket sexy vintage italiennes. Ces publications étaient produites principalement par les éditeurs Renzo Barbieri et Giorgio Cavedon à partir des années '60, et restent bien ancrées dans la mémoire collective italienne. Le projet Vintagerotika "Pop-Hard d'auteur" de Annexia vous les repropose, donc, grâce à des histoires originales et inédites, écrites par d'affirmés auteurs contemporains. Un rendez-vous immancable avec la Bande-Dessinée érotique d'auteur, pour donner une nouvelle lymphe à un genre considéré de série B e snobé par la critique, bien que publié partout en Europe. Chaque album (petit format) dédié à un des personnages fournira en outre un bref essai critique, ainsi que la chronologie des publications. 

Les personnages de la première phase du projet nommé EvilSex sont les anti-héroïnes de l'Horror-Sexy Made in Italy: Zora la vampire (Zara la vampire), Sukia, Cimitieria, Ulula, Lucifera, Belzeba, Jacula.

​​

 

Gli autori coinvolti sono nomi noti al pubblico dei lettori di fumetto. Copertine, storie e disegni sapranno soddisfare il gusto delgli appassionati in modo molto eterogeneo, senza però tradire l’essenza vintage del progetto e, soprattutto, il carattere stesso dei personaggi.​ 

The involved authors are well known to the comic readers audience. Covers, stories and drawings will appeal across the spectrum of fans in a pick and mix way, without betraying the vintage essence of the project and, above all, the personality of the characters.

Les Bandes-Dessinées seront écrites par des auteurs affirmés et déjà connus du public. Couvertures, histoires et dessins sauront satisfaire le goût des passionnés du genre de façon hétérogène sans pour autant trahir l'esprit vintage du projet, et encore moins le caractère spécifique des personnages orignaux. 

 

​

 

In caso di superamento del GOAL del crowdfunding, prima dello scadere dei due mesi previsti, verrà aggiunto un nuovo albo GRATIS, un nuovo personaggio per ogni piccolo nuovo obbiettivo di 1.500 €, il cui team creativo verrà svelato di volta in volta, e saranno, in ordine di apparizione: Naga la maga e Yra la vampira. Un regalo per tutti coloro che, con il loro contributo, hanno creduto nel progetto.​​​

Upon successful completion of the GOAL before expiration of 2 months, a new free book will be added, a new character for every next intermediate goal of 1500 eur, whose creative team will be disclosed each time. These new characters will be in order of appearance:  Naga la maga (the witch) and  Yra la vampira (the she-vampire). A present for all those that thanks to their contribution have believed in the project.

Au cas où le GOAL du Crowdfunding, serait rejoint avant le terme des deux mois prévus, un album gratuit sera ajouté. Pour chaque mini objectif de 1 500 € en plus du but, un nouveau personnage sera proposé. L'équipe créative de ce numéro extra sera révélée sur le moment. Par ordre de parution: Naga la maga (la sorcière), Yra la vampira (la Vampire). Un cadeau est prévu pour tous ceux qui auront cru et contribué à la réalisation de ce projet.

 

NAGA BY COSIMO FERRI

 

THE COMICS

 

Gli albi di 24 pagine, nel tradizionale formato pocket (13x18 cm.), conterranno una storia inedita a fumetti di 16 pagine, la scheda del personaggio e la cronologia della testata. Gli albi in edizione speciale (40 pagine, stesso formato), avranno una sovracopertina in acetato trasparente con stampati gli indumenti intimi delle nudità della copertina e il logo della testata, e conterranno in più 16 pagine di sketchbook del disegnatore con tavole a matita del fumetto, bozzetti e studi del personaggio.

The 24 pages books, in the traditional pocket format (12 x 18 cm) will contain a 16 pages story, the main character data sheet and the cronology of the sheet. The special edition books (40 pages same format), will have a book cover in transparent acetate with the underwear covering the nudities on the cover, and the sheet logo, and will contain 16 more pages of the author's sketchbook with pencil figures of the comic book, sketches and character's studies.

Les albums de 24 pages, format de poche (13x18 cm) comprennent une BD de 16 pages, la fiche détaillée du personnage et la chronologie des publications. Les albums de l'édition spéciale, de 40 pages toujours en format de poche, auront une sur-couverture transparente plastifiée où seront imprimés les sous-vêtements des nus en couverture. Ces albums comprennent en outre plus de 16 pages de croquis du dessinateur, les planche au crayon et les études du personnage.

 

R-RATED BY GIUSEPPE MANUNTA

TEAM NAGA AND YRA...? NOT NOW...!

 

Ci poniamo come obbiettivo quello di soddisfare la necessità feticistica dei lettori e dei collezionisti, cercando di colmare quel vuoto che, nel settore dell’erotismo a fumetti, perdura inspiegabilmente da diversi anni.

 

We want to satisfy the fetishistic needs of readers and collectors, trying to fill that gap that inexplicably endures (in Italy) in the erotic comics since many years.

 

Nous nous donnons comme objectif de satisfaire les attentes fétichistes des lecteurs et des collectionneurs, en cherchant à combler le vide qui s'est installé ces dernières années dans le secteur de la Bande-Dessinée érotique (in Italie...).

 

NAGA BY ANDREA CUNEO

 

THE CROWDFUNDING

 

Le ricompense del crowdfunding, saranno diverse e per tutti i gusti: dal classico portfolio delle copertine alla statua di un personaggio (Ulula), dalla possibilità di essere disegnati all'interno del fumetto e interagire eroticamente con i personaggi della testata, all’albo con Pin-up inedite di autori italiani professionisti non coinvolti nei disegni dei pocket, fino ad arrivare al calendario da parete. Tutto rigorosamente in edizione numerata e limitata a pochi perk. I contributi previsti nelle varie ricompense sono diversi: 21 € per l'edizione digitale degli albi, 70 € per l'edizione cartacea standard dei 7 albi di 24 pagine, 100 € per l'edizione collector dei 7 albi da 40 pagine più cofanetto, e via via aumentando a seconda del gadget aggiuntivo che si preferirà.​

​

The crowdfunding rewards will be several and for all tastes: from the classic cover portfolio to the action figure of the main character (Ulula, the She-wolf), from the chance to appear drawn in the book interacting with the characters to unpublished pin-up books by italian artists not included in the pocket books, up to the wall calendar. All rigorously in limited numbered editions. The contributions for the various rewards will be: 21€ for the digital edition, 70€ for the paper standard edition of the 7 x 24 pages pocket books, 100€ for the 7 x 40 pages collectors' editions with slipcase, and further increase on the basis of the chosen supplementary gadget .

 

Pour les participants du Crowdfunding, nous avons prévu des récompenses qui sauront s'adapter à tous les goûts: du classique portfolio de couvertures, à la statuette du personnage, du calendrier mural, à la possibilité d'être représenté et inséré dans la BD et d'intéragir avec les personnages du numéro, ou même un album inédit de Pin-up dont les auteurs, professionnels, n'auront pas participé à la réalisation des pockets. Pour recevoir ces récompenses, les contributions prévues sont: 21 € pour l'édition digitale des albums, 70 € pour l'édition support papier des 7 albums de 24 pages l'un, 100 € pour l'édition collector qui comprend les 7 albums de 40 pages plus le coffret, ...ainsi de suite, le prix variant en fonction du gadget désiré, jusqu'à un maximum de 1250 € pour le lot complet.​

 

SUKIA BY LOLA AIRAGHI

 

THE GOAL

 

 

 

LUCIFERA BY FRANCESCO RIPOLI

 

EASY PERK

 

 

 

 

 

EXTRA PERK

 

 

 

 

 

ULTRA PERK​

 

 

 

 

AFTER THE GOAL

 

Se il progetto sarà coronato da successo e verrà raggiunto il GOAL necessario, si partirà con la produzione degli albi e delle ricompense (febbraio/maggio), per poi andare in stampa a giugno e spedire il tutto.

If the project will be successfull and the needed GOAL will be reached, the production of the books and rewards will start (february/may) to be printed and finally shipped by june 2017.

​

Au cas où le GOAL soit atteint, nous commencerons à produire les albums et les récompenses (Février/Mai) de façon à passer à l'impression en Juin et de tout expédier.

​

 

SPESE DI SPEDIZIONE (ITALIA ESCLUSA)

Vintagerotika - Evilsex nasce da un'idea di Luca Laca Montagliani che sarà anche curatore di grafica e contenuti.

Vintagerotika – Evilsex comes from an idea of Luca Laca Montagliani that will be also the curator of graphics and contents.

Vintagerotika - Evilsex nait d'une idée de Luca Laca Montagliani qui s'occupera des contenus et des graphiques.
story_txt:
"C'era una volta, tanti tanti anni fa, un regno oscuro che popolava gli angoli bui di mezza Europa. Femmine diaboliche abitavano i pensieri proibiti degli uomini e delle donne più smaliziate e golose, i tetri anfratti delle case e i salotti dei barbieri. I loro nomi sono scolpiti sulle polverose lapidi della memoria: vampire senza vergogna, amanti morte, figlie del diavolo, streghe oscene e meretrici d'oltretomba stanno per risvegliarsi ed esaudire le vostre voglie più torbide e peccaminose. Solo la vostra insaziabile lussuria, il vostro perfetto feticismo potranno resuscitarle dall'oblio nel quale sono cadute, in un sonno profondo, avvolto dalle nebbie dell'abisso infernale. Quale incantesimo potrà risvegliarne le dolci, fredde membra? Quale desiderio occulto saprà riportarle in vita?".
 

ULULA BY EMANUELE TAGLIETTI
 
"Once upon a time, many many years ago, there was an obscure realm populating dark corners all over Europe. Diabolic female creature dwelled men's thoughts and savvy and greedy women's minds, wormed their way into the gloomy clefts of homes, living rooms and barbershops. Their names are carved on the dusty tombstones of memory: shameless vampires, dead lovers, devil's daughters, lewd witches and afterlife whores are about to reawaken to please your darkest and sinful cravings. Only your insatiable luxury, your perfect fetishism, will be able to revive them from the oblivion where they fell, in a deep sleep, shrouded in the fog of the infernal abyss. Which spell will reawaken their sweet cold limbs? Which occult desire could bring them back to life?".
"Il était une fois, il y'a bien des années, un univers sombre dont les créatures maudites habitaient les recoins obscurs d'Europe. Femelles diaboliques hantaient les rêveries languissantes d'hommes vicieux et de femmes gourmandes, ainsi que les recoins lugubres des celliers, caves et salons de coiffure. Leurs noms sont gravés dans les poussiéreux sépulcres de la mémoire: amantes défuntes, filles du diable, vampires sans vergogne, obscènes sorcières e méretrices d'outre-tombe n'attendent que vous pour se réveiller et assouvir vos envies pécheresses. Seule votre insatiable luxure et votre impeccable fétichisme pourraient les sortir de la torpeur dans laquelle elles sont tombées, recouvertes des brumes de l'infernal abîme de l'oubli. Quel sortilège pourra redonner vie à leurs corps doux et froids? Quel occulte désir saura les éveiller?".
 

 
Il progetto Vintagerotika - Evilsex di Annexia ripropone i generi e i personaggi più rappresentativi delle principali testate erotiche a fumetti dei pocket sexy vintage italiani, testate principalmente prodotte dagli editori Renzo Barbieri e Giorgio Cavedon dagli anni Sessanta in poi, ben radicate nella memoria collettiva italiana, con nuove brevi storie di famosi autori contemporanei. Un imperdibile appuntamento con il fumetto erotico d'autore per dare nuova vita e dignità a un genere considerato da sempre di serie B e snobbato dalla critica, ma pubblicato in tutta Europa per decenni. Ogni albo della rosa dei personaggi proposti conterrà anche un breve saggio critico e la cronologia della testata. 
I personaggi della prima fase del progetto, denominata EvilSex sono le antieroine dell’horror-sexy made in Italy: Zora la vampira, Sukia, Cimiteria, Ulula, Lucifera, Belzeba e Jacula.
 
Vintagerotika - Evilsex by Annexia calls out again the most representative genres and characters  of the main erotic comic books and Italian's sexy vintage pocket books. These were mainly produced by publishers Renzo Barbieri and Giorgio Cavedon as from the 70's onwards, deeply rooted in the Italian collective memory, including with new short stories by famous contemporary authors. An unmissable rendezvous with auter erotic comics to give new life and dignity to a genre that always rated a B serie genre  and snubbed by the critics, though published all over Europe for decades. Every book of the chosen characters shortlist will also feature a brief critical essay and the chronology of the sheet.

Le projet Vintagerotika "Pop-Hard d'auteur" de Annexia vous les repropose, donc, grâce à des histoires originales et inédites, écrites par d'affirmés auteurs contemporains. story:
"You never hear this side of the story. Our side.
History is written by the victors, the saying goes. How true.
It doesn’t matter.
I don’t really care what you think.
You’re probably not on MY side anyway."
- MORGANA

90 pages of Amazing Art and Original Story

Morgana is a 90 page fully independent fantasy Graphic Novel with a new take on the fabled mythical figures of Morgana, Merlin (the one with heterochromia) and Mordred (the blond haired one).
Magical beings that have transcended mortality, travel along with these grim antiheros between their origins in classical times (Imperial Rome) to modern days.

Fully Independent Graphic Novel

No big companies behind this Graphic Novel.
Morgana is made by artists. No corporate overlords behind this project.
All decisions, all rewards are from and go to the artists.

Already Almost Finished

The story and 90 pages of art are done.
All that remains is printing, and maybe additional Tiers as well as Perks.

Not your Ubiquitous Mainstream Plot

Dreaming of something original?
Tired of the safe uninspired troth being handed out routinely to you by companies that want to take no risk, edge all their bets, and wish to please everyone?
Especially fringe preachy self-entitled vocal elements dedicated to destroying entertainment and escapism.

Well have no fear with Morgana.
You can be assured of a completely unapologetic, non-politically correct story, characters and subject matters.
This is a graphic novel for grownups.
story_txt: "You never hear this side of the story. Our side.History is written by the victors, the saying goes. How true.It doesn’t matter.I don’t really care what you think.You’re probably not on MY side anyway."- MORGANA90 pages of Amazing Art and Original StoryMorgana is a 90 page fully independent fantasy Graphic Novel with a new take on the fabled mythical figures of Morgana, Merlin (the one with heterochromia) and Mordred (the blond haired one).Magical beings that have transcended mortality, travel along with these grim antiheros between their origins in classical times (Imperial Rome) to modern days.Fully Independent Graphic NovelNo big companies behind this Graphic Novel.Morgana is made by artists. No corporate overlords behind this project.All decisions, all rewards are from and go to the artists.Already Almost FinishedThe story and 90 pages of art are done.All that remains is printing, and maybe additional Tiers as well as Perks.Not your Ubiquitous Mainstream PlotDreaming of something original?Tired of the safe uninspired troth being handed out routinely to you by companies that want to take no risk, edge all their bets, and wish to please everyone?Especially fringe preachy self-entitled vocal elements dedicated to destroying entertainment and escapism.Well have no fear with Morgana.You can be assured of a completely unapologetic, non-politically correct story, characters and subject matters.This is a graphic novel for grownups.

story:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like if Toy Story was a slasher? What if Peter Pan required a sacrifice to enter Neverland? Find the answers to these questions and more within The Dusk County Chronicles; a horror-parody mini-anthology that will turn all of your childhood dreams into nightmares!

  • People who have fond memories of cartoons they loved as a kid.
  • People who want to see those same memories twisted into dark tales of TERROR! 
  • Fans of comics with cute art and dark story lines like I Hate Fairyland as well as horror anthologies like The Twilight Zone and Tales from the Crypt.
  • People who believe that not everything is what it seems and live for the plot twist ending!
  • People from Dusk County...If you've survived long enough to read this.

  • The Dusk County Chronicles #1 is a 24-page full color, standard size American formatted, comic that is printed on high quality paper.
  • Backers will receive four terrifically terrifying self-contained short stories in one convenient saddle-stitched package!
  • Backers of the "Passing Through (Digital Deluxe)" and higher tiers will receive additional bonus content featuring behind the scenes art, scripts, digital cover gallery, and concept sketches and designs.
  • At higher levels, Backers can receive, exclusive and limited variant covers featuring art by the talented Riccardo Faccini and the wonderful Ryan M. Kincaid.

The reviews are in! See what the comics industry pros have to say about The Dusk County Chronicles! 

See Full Reviews HERE:

 Review of The Dusk County Chronicles by Jason Marconnet (GenXGrownUp) 

 Review of The Dusk County Chronicles by Todd H. Latoski (READING IS FUN, NOT MENTAL)

 Review of The Dusk County Chronicles by Thehorrorreport.com

Who are the creators responsible for ruining your childhood?

Joel Rodriguez

Joel Rodriguez is the writer and letterer for The Dusk County Chronicles. Having been a fan of comics since he was a child, he founded Metal Ninja Studios as a central hub for his comic career and is now seeking your help to bring his dreams of telling stories through the art of comics to life. He is co-scripting as well as working as editor and letterer for Kooper. He's also working as letterer on multiple in-production projects including Psychosis and The Goode Girls and the Ghost of Lockeridge Academy as well upcoming stories from Supercilious Comics.

Roman Gubsky

Roman Gubsky is a comic book artist who was born in Russia. After drawing comic books as a hobby for 10 years, Roman decided to follow his dream of working as a full-time comic book artist. He has since moved to Costa Rica and is now working to make his dream a reality. Aside from The Dusk County Chronicles, Roman is credited as the artist behind Crossbones. He is currently working on art for Behemoth Comics, Supercilious Comics, and an upcoming issue of Lizards by John Holland.

 Riccardo Faccini

 Riccardo Faccini was born in Turin, Italy, where he lived and studied until graduating from the Academy of Fine Arts. He currently works with companies such as The Australian FFC (Australia), Source Point Press (U.S.A.), as well as Shockdom and Novel Comix (Italy).

Ryan M. Kincaid

Ryan M. Kincaid is an artist doing cover work for various companies. He mainly works on indie titles but has done a few main stream books.  He has most recently worked on variant covers for Sink by Comixtribe and Stabbity Bunny by Scout Comics and is currently working on art for the Stabbity Ever After story line.

Why did we have to tell this story?

A Message from Joel

Ever since I purchased my first issue of Spawn #1 as a young kid (probably younger than I should have been), I remember the sense of joy that I got from reading comics during the best and worst times of my life. I want to share that feeling with others through my creations.

The Dusk County Chronicles holds a special place in my heart as it is the first official step towards realizing my dream of being a comic book creator. By backing this project, you support this passion project of mine, which is about more that just telling a silly story.

My mother always told me "Never judge a book by its cover". That lesson didn't really stick until my adult years. This world is full of hidden shadows and everyone has a story that they try not to tell. Maybe the happiest person in the room has the darkest secrets and the most pain. That guy that cut you off on the highway... maybe his wife is sick in the hospital and he is rushing to get to her before it is too late. Sure, the chances of that are slim, but my mom taught me that I need to think about the possibility before jumping to conclusions.   

Every light casts a shadow, and I wrote The Dusk County Chronicles to expose some of them while embracing the contradictory nature of our lives. Sure, it may look like a cartoon that you watched when you were a kid...but welcome to Dusk County, where your dreams become nightmares. 

Journey into Dusk County and read the full first story as a preview!

story:
The Walls Have Ears...and Voices, Too!

What if you could talk to buildings, and the buildings talked back? What if Heaven was humanity's rightful home, and only you could tear down its walls?

These are the questions that drive Shaw Serling, the young heroine of my graphic novel, Hell's Treasure. But the biggest question of all is this: Will you help bring Hell's Treasure to life? If the answer is yes, prepare to receive some awesome rewards.

Go, Team Hell's Treasure!

Bring together one award-winning writer (that's me, Robert Jeschonek), one rising star artist (Megan Levens of Somewhere in Between) and one hard-hitting letterer (the man called Crank!), and you've got the perfect team to make Hell's Treasure an unforgettable book.

Here's The Story

I'm dying to share this project with the world. It's all about Shaw, a teenage girl who can communicate with architecture--everything from buildings to bridges--and make it do her bidding.

Her power can't save her parents from dying in a car crash...but maybe she can bring them back. A boy named Aaron, with powers of his own, takes her on a quest to seize the keys to Heaven.

Angels fight like hell to stop them. Only boy genius John Halcyon, an exile from Heaven, knows the secret behind their struggle: that Heaven is humanity's rightful home, and Shaw is destined to tear down the walls keeping out the human race.

Why Indiegogo?

Hell's Treasure has almost come to life several times in the publishing world...but "almost" isn't good enough anymore. Publishers might be reluctant to take a chance on something this new and fresh, but you have the power to make this book a reality.

Team Hell's Treasure Wants You!

And if you join the Hell's Treasure team, you won't be disappointed. Megan is a fabulous artist, currently working on projects for several high profile publishers. Crank is a wizard with lettering and has got one hell of a resume (Hack/Slack, Battle Pug, It Girl and the Atomics).

As for me, I've written for DC Comics (most recently, "Gotham Eye View" in Legends of the Dark Knight #52). I've written over 100 books, e-books, and audiobooks, including official Star Trek and Doctor Who fiction. My rock 'n' roll fantasy My Favorite Band Does Not Exist won the Forward National Literature Award and was named a Top 10 First Novel for Youth by prestigious Booklist magazine. Not to mention, I run my own publishing company, Pie Press. What all this means is that I know how to write a great graphic novel, and I know how to publish and ship it like a pro.

Being in the Heart of the Action

We're going to do this book right, because we know you wouldn't have it any other way. That means you'll get the full, finished graphic novel in your hot little hands in August 2014. It will take until then for Mighty Megan and Captivating Crank to pencil, ink, color, and letter all 145 pages of this epic tome!

But fear not! If you back Team Hell's Treasure at the $15 level or above, the time will fly, because we'll ship quarterly installments straight to your e-mail inbox. You'll get to watch the graphic novel take shape before your very eyes. 

And if you pledge $20 or more, your quarterly installments will include bonus PDFs of all the latest pages in each stage of production: pencils, inks, and colors. So the time until the book's completion will keep you right in the heart of the action, watching as this project comes to life.

Dough, Bread, Moola, Cold Hard Cash

Shaw Serling communicates with buildings, but you're the one with the real power here. Because Hell's Treasure will only come to life with your backing.

Over half the original goal amount will go to pay Megan, a professional artist who does quality work. She depends on her art to put food on the table; if I don't pay her a decent rate per page, she literally can't afford to do the work. Crank will get a piece of the pie, too, for the same reason, and so will I. The rest of the proceeds will fund the production and shipping of the books and rewards.

You'll see the money right there on the pages, and in the awesome rewards. Remember, you get what you pay for.

Get Your Swag On!

If you love rewards, you've come to the right place. Because yes, we're bringing the swag! Megan's already sharpening her pencils to whip up limited edition sketch cards, one-of-a-kind custom sketches, and holy-crap-is-that-ever-cool signed editions of the book tricked out with sketches on multiple pages. Not to mention the illustrated cameos and illustrated cameo speaking roles that will appear in every edition and copy of the graphic novel. And that's not all! We've also got t-shirts, bundles of e-books, stacks of paperbacks...even the full manuscript of the sequel, Hell's Power. Remember, all our rewards are exclusive to Hell's Treasure Kickstarter backers.

Did Somebody Say Stretch?

When it comes to stretch goals, we've got big plans. Any funding above our goal amount will go toward new Hell's Treasure projects for you to enjoy...but if we stretch far enough, our wish list will really kick into gear. We hope you'll unlock the whole list, which we'll reveal as the project raises more money. But we can tell you this much: the sequel's already been written, and it won't shut up about making it into print!

Artwork from the Book

Interested yet? Take a look at these tantalizing sample pages from the book. They were all penciled, inked, and colored by Megan Levens and lettered by the one and only Crank. Get a load of the high quality product you can expect from the Hell's Treasure team.

 

 

 

Risks and Challenges

We never know what curve balls life is going to throw at us. Just like Shaw in Hell's Treasure, anyone could face the biggest challenges at any time...and they could put a very big crimp in our best-laid plans. So if a member of Team Hell's Treasure meets up with an unexpected roll of the dice during the next year, it could alter our delivery schedule for the graphic novel and rewards. If that happens, we promise to do our best to come up with alternate arrangements to deliver the book and rewards to you in as timely a fashion as possible. And we promise to keep you in the loop throughout the process so you'll know exactly what to expect and when. Because you'll be a member of Team Hell's Treasure, and we take care of our own!
